Author: John Savill's Technical Training
Title: Azure Update - 29th August 2025
Description:
Nice selection of updates this week.

🔎 Looking for content on a particular topic? Search the channel. If I have something it will be there! 🤔 Due to the channel growth and number of people wanting help I no longer can answer or even read questions and they will just stay in the moderation queue never to be seen so please post questions to other sites like Reddit, Microsoft Community Hub etc.

▬▬▬▬▬▬ C H A P T E R S ⏰ ▬▬▬▬▬▬ 00:00 - Introduction 00:09 - New videos 01:15 - Azure Migrate ZRS disk support 01:56 - Azure Functions Node.js 22 support 02:07 - Roslyn Analyzer for Durable Functions 03:12 - Azure CNI Overlay with AGC and AGIC 04:01 - App Gateway WAF custom block response 04:32 - ANF short-term 05:12 - Entra ID and RBAC for GetAccountInfo 05:57 - Azure SQL DB replication lag metric 06:36 - Azure SQL local container 06:54 - SQL schema tools 07:12 - SQL Server enabled by Azure Arc US Gov 08:00 - ADMS schema migration 08:24 - Cosmos DB for MongoDB shards and rebalance 09:31 - PostgreSQL Entra group login 10:08 - New Austria region 10:42 - Provisioned spillover for OpenAI 12:07 - New MAI-Voice-1 and MAI-1-preview 12:41 - New VMware to Hyper-V migration 13:16 - Close
